 2 : the spreading of ideas, information, or rumor for the purpose of helping or injuring an institution, a cause, or a person

 Merely because one may sympathize with such images does not make them propaganda. In fact, if you are sympathizing it is a sign that the propaganda is working. Turning off virtually all emotion is almost foolproof method of detecting propaganda from any source.
